title: Print Even Numbers in Array
desc: Print all even numbers from an array without using built-in functions

title: Print Odd Numbers in Array
desc: Print all odd numbers from an array

title: Check Prime Number
desc: Check if a number is prime using loops
code:
<?php
$n = 7;
$isPrime = true;
if ($n <= 1) $isPrime = false;
for ($i = 2; $i <= $n / 2; $i++) {
    if ($n % $i == 0) {
        $isPrime = false;
        break;
    }
}
echo $isPrime ? 'Prime' : 'Not Prime';
?>

title: Reverse String Without Builtin
desc: Reverse a string without using strrev

title: Factorial Using Recursion
code:
<?php
function fact($n) {
    if ($n == 0) return 1;
    return $n * fact($n - 1);
}
echo fact(5);
?>

title: Check Palindrome String
desc: Check if a string is palindrome

title: Find Duplicate Elements
code:
<?php
$arr = [1,2,3,2,4,1];
for ($i = 0; $i < count($arr); $i++) {
    for ($j = $i + 1; $j < count($arr); $j++) {
        if ($arr[$i] == $arr[$j]) {
            echo $arr[$i] . ' ';
            break;
        }
    }
}
?>

title: Find Max and Min in Array
desc: Find maximum and minimum without built-in functions
code:
<?php
$arr = [4,2,9,1];
$max = $min = $arr[0];
for ($i = 1; $i < count($arr); $i++) {
    if ($arr[$i] > $max) $max = $arr[$i];
    if ($arr[$i] < $min) $min = $arr[$i];
}
echo 'Max=' . $max . ' Min=' . $min;
?>

title: Sort Array Without sort
desc: Sort array in ascending order manually
code:
<?php
$arr = [3,1,4,2];
$n = count($arr);
for ($i = 0; $i < $n; $i++) {
    for ($j = $i+1; $j < $n; $j++) {
        if ($arr[$i] > $arr[$j]) {
            $temp = $arr[$i];
            $arr[$i] = $arr[$j];
            $arr[$j] = $temp;
        }
    }
}
foreach ($arr as $v) echo $v . ' ';
?>

title: Mini Calculator
code:
<?php
$a = 10; $b = 5; $op = '+';
switch ($op) {
    case '+': echo $a + $b; break;
    case '-': echo $a - $b; break;
    case '*': echo $a * $b; break;
    case '/': echo $a / $b; break;
}
?>

title: Character Frequency
desc: Count frequency of characters in string
code:
<?php
$str = 'hello';
for ($i = 0; $i < strlen($str); $i++) {
    $count = 0;
    for ($j = 0; $j < strlen($str); $j++) {
        if ($str[$i] == $str[$j]) $count++;
    }
    echo $str[$i] . '=' . $count . ' ';
}
?>

title: Pair Sum in Array
code:
<?php
$arr = [1,4,5,6];
$sum = 7;
for ($i = 0; $i < count($arr); $i++) {
    for ($j = $i+1; $j < count($arr); $j++) {
        if ($arr[$i] + $arr[$j] == $sum) {
            echo $arr[$i] . ',' . $arr[$j] . ' ';
        }
    }
}
?>

title: Leap Year Check
code:
<?php
$year = 2024;
if (($year % 4 == 0 && $year % 100 != 0) || $year % 400 == 0)
    echo 'Leap Year';
else
    echo 'Not Leap Year';
?>

title: Common Elements in Arrays
desc: Find common elements in two arrays

title: Check Anagram
desc: Check if two strings are anagrams
code:
<?php
$s1='listen'; $s2='silent';
if (strlen($s1)!=strlen($s2)) { echo 'No'; exit; }
for ($i=0;$i<strlen($s1);$i++) {
    if (substr_count($s2,$s1[$i]) != substr_count($s1,$s1[$i])) {
        echo 'No'; exit;
    }
}
echo 'Yes';
?>
